title: Jean Tirole | Biography, Nobel Prize, & Facts | Britannica Money

quotes: born: August 9, 1953, Troyes, France (age 72)
Tirole earned bachelor’s degrees in engineering and decision mathematics at the École Polytechnique in France and the Université Paris Dauphine, respectively, in 1976.
In 1978 he received a specialized doctorate in decision mathematics from Dauphine,
and in 1981 he earned a Ph.D. in economics at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT).
He then worked as a researcher at the École Nationale des Ponts et Chaussées in Paris until 1984,
when he began teaching at MIT, where he remained until 1992.
In 2011 he cofounded the École d’Économie de Toulouse (Toulouse School of Economics).
Jean Tirole, 2014.
Nobel Prize winner Jean Tirole, 2014.
who was awarded the 2014 Nobel Prize for Economics
